DOC.HEADLINE: BOY , 17 , WHO KILLED HIS FAMILY GETS 4 LIFE TERMS
DOC.TEXT: A teenager who pleaded guilty to killing his father , mother , brother and sister received four life terms . Michael Neugebauer , 17 , could be eligible for parole in 24 years with good behavior . He had pleaded guilty in October to killing his father . Neugebauer said he can ' t remember killing the rest of his family in January , 1992 , but he pleaded guilty Friday to the other murders , acknowledging that prosecutors have enough evidence to convict him .
